class modules.bank.banks.Program(condition, title, link, rates)¶

Bases: object

find_best(current_incomes=0, currency=None)¶

method for finding best rate for current program

the program analise the number of propositions of current bank, each program`s profit and customer rating. only programs that are recommended for current family are counted (if current incomes are higher then minimal invest in the bank)

Parameters

  • current_incomes – current incomes of the family

  • currency – current currency

Returns

the best program for the family

transform_rates(rates)¶

method for transforming rates in needed format

Parameters

rates – list of rates

Returns

sorted list
